mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(PRDUCT_NM, " - ", DLVGDS_ENTRPS_NM) AS MATRL_PLAN , MATRL_CT_SN , CNTRCTAMOUNT , PRDUCT_NM , DLVGDS_ENTRPS_NM , DTL_CN , UNTPC , QY , mcp.PRJCT_ID FROM MATRL_CT_PRMPC mcp JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) pbp ON (mcp.PRJCT_ID = pbp.PRJCT_ID AND mcp.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR) WHERE 1=1 AND mcp.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03701' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TEMP, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03702' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TERMINATED_MY, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704' AND ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS DENY, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN al.ATRZ_STTS_CD = 'VTW00801' AND al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS_APPROVAL, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN al.ATRZ_STTS_CD = 'VTW00802' AND al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TERMINATED_APRVR_EMP, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03702' AND rm.EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS PROGRESS_REFER, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ea.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' AND rm.EMP_ID = #{empId} THEN rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID END) AS TERMINATED_REFER FROM ELCTRN_ATRZ ea LEFT JOIN ATRZ_LN al ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = al.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID LEFT JOIN REFRN_MAN rm ON ea.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID WHERE ea.ATRZ_DMND_EMP_ID = #{empId} OR al.APRVR_EMP_ID = #{empId} OR rm.EMP_ID = #{empId}

( SELECT ln.ATRZ_STEP_CD AS APPROVAL_CODE, cd.CD_NM AS ATRZ_STEP_CD_NM, cd2.CD_NM AS ATRZ_STTS_CD_NM, e.EMP_FLNM, (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD) JBPS_NM, NULL AS LIST_EMP_FLNM, DATE_FORMAT(ln.MDFCN_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS MDFCN_DT, ln.RJCT_PRVONSH FROM ATRZ_LN ln LEFT JOIN EMP e ON ln.APRVR_EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN CD cd ON ln.ATRZ_STEP_CD = cd.CD_VALUE LEFT JOIN CD cd2 ON ln.ATRZ_STTS_CD = cd2.CD_VALUE WHERE 1=1 AND ln.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT rm.REFRN_CNCRRNC_CL_CD AS APPROVAL_CODE, NULL AS ATRZ_STEP_CD_NM, NULL AS ATRZ_STTS_CD_NM, NULL AS EMP_FLNM, NULL AS JBPS_NM, CONCAT(d.DEPT_NM, ' ', e.EMP_FLNM, ' ', (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = e.JBPS_CD)) LIST_EMP_FLNM, NULL AS APRV_YMD, NULL AS RJCT_PRVONSH FROM REFRN_MAN rm LEFT JOIN EMP e ON rm.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT_HNF dh ON e.EMP_ID = dh.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN DEPT d ON dh.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE rm.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId} AND rm.REFRN_CNCRRNC_CL_CD LIKE '%VTW00706' )

SELECT (SELECT OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM from OUTORD_ENTRPS oe WHERE oe.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID = oep.OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID) as OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM , OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID , OUTORD_ENTRPS_CT_PRMPC_SN , TKCG_JOB , DTL_DTLS , CTRT_BGNG_YMD , CTRT_END_YMD , INPT_PRNMNT_HNF_CNT , EXPECT_CT FROM OUTORD_ENTRPS_CT_PRMPC oep JOIN (SELECT MAX(BGT_MNG_ODR) AS BGT_MNG_ODR, PRJCT_ID FROM PRJCT_BGT_PRMPC WHERE 1=1 AND ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' GROUP BY PRJCT_ID) pbp ON (oep.PRJCT_ID = pbp.PRJCT_ID AND oep.BGT_MNG_ODR = pbp.BGT_MNG_ODR) WHERE 1=1 AND oep.PRJCT_ID = #{prjctId}
SELECT OUTORD_ENTRPS_ID AS PRDUCT_ID, OUTORD_ENTRPS_NM AS PRDUCT_NM from OUTORD_ENTRPS
SELECT MAX(ATRZ_LN_SN) AS MAX_ATRZ_LN_SN FROM ATRZ_LN WHERE 1=1 AND ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROW_ID , cd1.CD_NM AS CT_STLM_SE_CD_NM , CT_STLM_SE_CD , RCIPT_PBLCN_YMD , cad.CNPT_NM -- 거래처명 , cad.CLM_AMT , cd2.CD_NM AS EXPENS_CD_NM , cad.DTL_USE_DTLS , cad.CLM_PRPOS FROM CLM_ATRZ ca JOIN CLM_ATRZ_DTL cad ON (ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = cad.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID) JOIN CD cd1 ON (cad.CT_STLM_SE_CD = cd1.CD_VALUE) JOIN CD cd2 ON (cad.EXPENS_CD = cd2.CD_VALUE) WHERE 1=1 AND ca.ELCTRN_ATRZ_ID = #{elctrnAtrzId}
